machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G28 Z0 ; retract and move away
M280 P0 S160 ; set servo 0 to position 160 (no clue)
G4 P400 ; dwell (wait some time)
  M280 P0 S160 ; set servo 0 to position 160 (still no clue)
M104 S0 ; turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M106 P1 S0 ; turn off layer fan
M107 ; turn off fan
G1 X0 Y210; home X axis and push Y forward
M84 ; disable motors
; matterhackers end song
M300 S1760 P20    ; End Tone
M300 S880 P20     ; End Tone

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ; set units to millimeters
G90 ; use absolute positioning
M82 ; absolute extrusion mode
G28 ; home all axes
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ; set extruder temp
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; set bed temp
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; wait for bed temp
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ; wait for extruder temp
G29 P1 ; automated bed probing for leveling
G29 P3 T ; continue probing until all points are filled
G29 F 10.0 ; fade height for correction at 10mm
G29 A ; active unified bed leveling system
G92 E0 ; purge the line 
G1 X5 Y5 Z0.8 F1800 ; move to x=5,y=5,z=0.8 at 1800 mm/s
G1 X100 Z0.3 E25 F900 ; move to x=100,z=0.3,extrude 25mm, at 900 mm/s
G92 E0 ; new extruder position
G1 E-2 F2400 ; retract filament rate 2400 mm/s

speed_travel.value: 150.0 if speed_print < 60 else 250.0 if speed_print > 100 else speed_print * 2.5

speed_travel_layer_0.value: 100 if speed_layer_0 < 20 else 150 if speed_layer_0 > 30 else speed_layer_0 * 5
